res.word: Mohsen Fakhrizadeh has been assassinated in Damavand, east of Tehran according to reports in Iran
res.lemma: Mohsen Fakhrizadeh has been assassinated in Damavand, east of Tehran according to reports in Iran

res.word: He was head of Iran’s secret military program and wanted for many years by Mossad
res.lemma: He was head of Iran’s secret military program and wanted for many years by Mossad

res.word: His death is a major psychological and professional blow for Iran
res.lemma: His death is a major psychological and professional blow for Iran

res.word: This was a criminal act & highly reckless
res.lemma: This was a criminal act & highly reckless

res.word: It risks lethal retaliation & a new round of regional conflict
res.lemma: It risks lethal retaliation & a new round of regional conflict

res.word: Iranian leaders would be wise to wait for the return of responsible American leadership on the global stage & to resist the urge to respond against perceived culprits
res.lemma: Iranian leaders would be wise to wait for the return of responsible American leadership on the global stage & to resist the urge to respond against perceived culprits
